TopicTitle: Mk I Cockpit IVA Bubble Canopy

Articles.Content: Hi all. I'm in search of a Mk I IVA that removes the sight-obstructing canopy structure. From the outside, they obviously don't belong, and just imagine the joy of flying IVA with a full view of the sky! Thanks!
You could try making the Mk1 use the other 1.75m cockpits interior. Cant remember the name of the cockpit or how to change it, but its definately possible.
